title: Please someone share ECE course 4 years syllabus copy (course structure)
content: Please someone share ECE course 4 years syllabus copy (course structure)

comments.body:
Please shift to CSE / CSE-AIML Bro. I request all juniors to shift to CSE / CSE - AIML please.

I cannot see any more ECE ppl joining PES.
refer PES University - ECE handbook, on pes official website. U can download from that

But that is the 2018 handbook 
When will they release the 2024 batch handbook (course structure)

But that is 2018 handbook 
When will they release 2024 latest handbook (course structure)
Best to ask a current student to send it. Join the discord server and ask there
Our batch has no handbook only bro. It is only the 2024 handbook which is latest
If that's the most recent one then send it to OP over DM
Can you please share that with me
